block.p: LEAD: Louisa Weightman Wright, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Spencer D. Wright 3d of Philadelphia, was married yesterday to Coleman Sellers 6th, the son of Mr. and Mrs. William W. Sellers of Wayne, Pa. The Rev. Charles A. Carter 3d and the Rev. James R. MacColl 3d performed the ceremony at St. Paul's Episcopal Church in the Chestnut Hill section of Philadelphia.

LEAD: Louisa Weightman Wright, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Spencer D. Wright 3d of Philadelphia, was married yesterday to Coleman Sellers 6th, the son of Mr. and Mrs. William W. Sellers of Wayne, Pa. The Rev. Charles A. Carter 3d and the Rev. James R. MacColl 3d performed the ceremony at St. Paul's Episcopal Church in the Chestnut Hill section of Philadelphia.

Louisa Weightman Wright, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Spencer D. Wright 3d of Philadelphia, was married yesterday to Coleman Sellers 6th, the son of Mr. and Mrs. William W. Sellers of Wayne, Pa. The Rev. Charles A. Carter 3d and the Rev. James R. MacColl 3d performed the ceremony at St. Paul's Episcopal Church in the Chestnut Hill section of Philadelphia. Mrs. Sellers, a graduate of the Hotchkiss School and Trinity College in Hartford, is a sales assistant at Morgan Stanley & Company in New York. The bridegroom, a freelance photographer, graduated from Ithaca College.
